text: The Diolite Kinen (in Japanese: ダイオライト記念), is a horse race for four-year-olds at Funabashi Racecourse. ==Race details== The first edition of the race took place on March 15, 1956. The race has been held in March since its inception. The race is named after the racehorse, Diolite. ==Winners since 2015== Winners since 2015 include: {| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size:90%" |- ! width="36px" | Year ! width="120px" | Winner ! width="140px" | Jockey ! width="150px" | Trainer !
